name: Santa Claus Secret - Stack Puzzle - Free
name_original: Santa Claus Secret - Stack Puzzle - Free
description:
We have styled the classics into brand new top apps!
With this app... it fun to play games again!
Old Games - Brand New!

Do you remember the old classics? This is an old game in a new modern style. Get this app now and play the new styled classic game on your device - beat the score and fight against the colors. The perfect casual game. Good old games are still good games, right?
Yes, it is Free!
